para.sentence: Let p_{n}(\xi) , n=0,1,\dots , be the orthonormal set of polynomials defined by \int_{-\infty}^{\infty}\exp\left(-\tfrac{1}{4}\xi^{4}-z\xi^{2}\right)p_{m}(\xi )p_{n}(\xi)\mathrm{d}\xi=\delta_{m,n}, with recurrence relation a_{n+1}(z)p_{n+1}(\xi)=\xi p_{n}(\xi)-a_{n}(z)p_{n-1}(\xi), for n=1,2,\dots ; compare §18.2.

Then u_{n}(z)=(a_{n}(z))^{2} satisfies the nonlinear recurrence relation (u_{n+1}+u_{n}+u_{n-1})u_{n}=n-2zu_{n}, for n=1,2,\dots , and also \mbox{P}_{\mbox{\scriptsize IV}} with \alpha=-\tfrac{1}{2}n and \beta=-\tfrac{1}{2}n^{2}.
For this result and applications see Fokas et al. (1991): in this reference, on the right-hand side of Eq. (1.10),
(n+\gamma)^{2} should be replaced by n+\gamma at its first appearance.
See alsoFreud (1976), Brézin et al. (1978), Fokas et al. (1992), and Magnus (1995).
